translation.en: Harper, just please get your shoes on. Please.
translation.es: Harper, ponte los zapatos. Por favor.

translation.en: I don't want to.
Come on.
Hey, do you know what we're doing today?
We're going on an adventure together.
We're going to get on a boat. We're gonna sail across the sea to a place
translation.es: Nos subiremos a un barco, navegaremos hasta un lugar

translation.en: where it's always sunny and you can eat ice cream every day.
translation.es: donde siempre está soleado, y podrás tomar helado todos los días.

translation.en: Would you like that?
Good. The only thing is,
we need to leave now. Okay?
Do you know why?
No.
Because there's a dragon out there.
And if we make any noise, or if we're too slow, the dragon will eat us. Okay?
translation.es: Y si hacemos ruido o vamos muy lento, el dragón nos comerá. ¿Está bien?

translation.en: So are you going to put your shoes on for me?
You okay?
Okay, Harper. I think you just have to walk. Is that all right?
All right, there you go.
Yeah, over there.
Here's the money.
Which boat?
- It's the blue fishing trawler. - Right.
Right, young lady. In you go.
There you go.
Harper's been practicing this song all week.
translation.es: Harper pasó toda la semana ensayando.

translation.en: It's been driving me and Jordi mad.
translation.es: Nos volvió locos a Jordi y a mí.

translation.en: Off you go.
There was a woman in Germany who got a song stuck in her head for four years.
translation.es: Una mujer en Alemania tuvo una canción en la mente cuatro años.

translation.en: She ended up being hospitalized.
That can't be real.
- Actually, I think maybe it was hiccups. - It's an urban myth.
translation.es: Creo que era hipo. Es un mito urbano.

translation.en: Well, you're the teacher.
Supply teacher, so…
Well, only until the big interview on Tuesday.
translation.es: Solo hasta la gran entrevista del martes.

translation.en: I just hope you remember us little people when you're swanning about the staff room.
translation.es: Espero que nos recuerdes cuando estés en la sala de profesores.

translation.en: Oh, of course I will, uh…
Olivia? School secretary?
Very funny.
Thank you.
She's enjoying it, though.
Yeah. It's good. I think she's finally starting to fit in here.
translation.es: Sí. Es bueno. Creo que, por fin, está empezando a encajar aquí.

translation.en: I'm very happy we ended up in Barcelona.
translation.es: Me alegra haber venido a Barcelona.

translation.en: Plus, she gets to be a planet.
translation.es: Además, así ella puede ser un planeta.

translation.en: Well, she's… she's Pluto, isn't she?
Yeah, but it still counts.
Yeah.
- - What did you say?
- Hey! Hey! - Stop!
- Hey! Enough! - You're so annoying!
Hey! Hey! Break it up!
- You fucking fucker-- - Stop!
What are you doing?
Harper, enough.
So are you going to tell me?
I mean, there's got to be a reason.
Getting kicked out of the musical.
translation.es: para que te echaran del musical.

translation.en: It's just, you seemed pretty vocal before.
F this, F that.
translation.es: M esto, h de lo otro.

translation.en: Harp.
I've got to go to the toilet.
SUPERMARKET
The supermarket will close in two minutes.
translation.es: La tienda cerrará dentro de dos minutos.

translation.en: Don't miss our special three for two offer in frozen foods.
translation.es: Aprovechen la oferta de tres por dos en alimentos congelados.

translation.en: So, you know, we're closing soon to do inventory.
translation.es: Cerraremos pronto para una revisión de inventario.

translation.en: Oh, sorry my Catalan is very bad. Sorry.
translation.es: Perdón, no te entiendo. Lo siento.

translation.en: We close in five minutes.
Okay, thank you.
Harper, say thank you.
Harp!
FYI, when you throw a punch, you need to keep your fist tight.
translation.es: Cuando des un golpe, mantén el puño apretado.

translation.en: It's basic physics.
Dissipates the force of impact. Otherwise, you'll damage your knuckles and wrists.
translation.es: Disipa la fuerza del impacto, si no, te dañarás las manos.

translation.en: Of course, all of this is irrelevant
'cause you're never going to hit anyone again, are you?
translation.es: porque nunca volverás a golpear a nadie, ¿verdad?

translation.en: He asked where my white stick was.
Said I needed to stay at the back of the stage 'cause…
translation.es: Dijo que me fuera al fondo del escenario…

translation.en: Antonio is a little S- H- I- T.
A shit.
You're not meant to say the word. That's the point of spelling it out.
translation.es: No debes decir la palabra. Para eso la deletreamos.

translation.en: You will apologize, okay?
We don't solve our problems with violence.
translation.es: No resolvemos los problemas con violencia.

translation.en: Are you going to tell Jordi?
Don't know. We'll see.
You can call him Dad, you know.
Mmm, I know, I just like the name Jordi.
translation.es: Lo sé, me gusta el nombre Jordi.

translation.en: Yeah, but I still think he prefers for you to call him Dad.
translation.es: Sí, pero creo que prefiere que lo llames papá.

translation.en: I thought I told you, eyes on the ground! Shut the fuck up!
translation.es: ¡Te lo dije, mira hacia abajo! ¡Cállate, carajo!

translation.en: Stay quiet. Stay quiet. Quick.
- Sh! Sh! - What?
Down.
Are you okay?
Mum!
It's you.
Ambulance! Someone, call an ambulance!
Erin! Harper!
- Jordi! - Hey!
We're okay.
Nurse Garcia, please contact Urology.
- Are you okay? - It's okay.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Sí. - Dijeron que… - No es mi sangre.

translation.en: It's not my blood.
translation.es: - Dijeron que… - No es mi sangre.

translation.en: - It's okay. - Okay.
Okay, let's get you to a room. Yeah?
You're okay…
Okay…
Bruised ribs, hip contusion, minor concussions.
translation.es: Se golpeó las costillas y la cadera, traumatismos leves.

translation.en: I'll prescribe some painkillers, okay?
Okay.
All things considered, it could have been worse.
translation.es: Dadas las circunstancias, podría haber sido peor.

translation.en: You and Harper are good to go.
Thank you.
We remind you smoking is not permitted in this hospital.
translation.es: Les recordamos que se prohíbe fumar en el hospital.

translation.en: Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas.
translation.es: Se puede fumar en las áreas designadas.

translation.en: So?  I'm all right. Just a bit of bruising.
Hey.
Are you okay?
What happened was pretty scary. It's okay not to be okay.
translation.es: Lo que pasó fue aterrador. Está bien no estar bien.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Hey, I spotted a machine down the hall.
translation.es: Vi una máquina expendedora en el pasillo.

translation.en: Why don't you get yourself a snack and a fizzy drink?
You said I'm not allowed any snacks or fizzy drinks after six o'clock.
translation.es: Dijiste que no podía hasta las seis.

translation.en: - I think we can make an exception. - Yeah.
Here you go.
Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas,
translation.es: Se puede fumar en las áreas designadas,

translation.en: at the canteen exit, and at the Emergency entrances.
translation.es: en la puerta de la cafetería y la entrada de Urgencias.

translation.en: As a nurse, they train you to act calm and professional.
translation.es: Los enfermeros aprendemos a actuar con calma y profesionalismo.

translation.en: It's actually quite reassuring.
Ah, good, 'cause inside I'm completely freaking out.
translation.es: Bien. Porque, por dentro, estoy enloqueciendo.

translation.en: I'm so glad you're safe.
What happened to the guy?
Uh, he's out of surgery.
- Okay. - Yeah, he's in ICU.
translation.es: - Bien. - Sí, está en la UCI.

translation.en: He lost a lot of blood, though, so he might not make it through the night.
translation.es: Perdió mucha sangre, quizá no sobreviva.

translation.en: Can I see him?
Erin, this is not your fault.
At all.
But let me see what I can do.
We can't stay long, okay?
Shit. I… I forgot to tell Harper where we were going.
translation.es: Mierda. Olvidé decirle a Harper adónde íbamos.

translation.en: I'll be a minute.
Okay.
You.
It's you, Kate. It's really you.
translation.es: Eres tú, Kate… Realmente eres tú.

translation.en: I don't know you.
We've never met.
Liar.
Liar!
Liar.
Emergency. All available doctors report to room 124.
translation.es: Médicos disponibles a la habitación 124. Toma. Siéntate ahí.

translation.en: Sit here.
Wait here. Okay?
You have to go.
It's okay, baby.
You sure you're okay?
Yeah.
Well…
No.
It's like Harper said. It's 50/50.
Well, you know, they have people at the hospital, uh, counselors.
Specialists who deal with post- traumatic situations.
translation.es: que se especializan en situaciones postraumáticas.

translation.en: Yeah.
Oh. What are you doing?
I'm distracting you.
That's not… going to work.
It's going to work.
Okay. It is going to work. But I still think that we should talk
translation.es: Bien. Va a funcionar. Pero igual creo que deberíamos hablar

translation.en: about what happened.
That's why I'm trying to distract you.
- Hey there. - Mmm.
Right.
See you in a bit.
- Bye. - Bye.
There you go. Three, two, one.
- Okay! - Will you eat some more?
- Okay. - It's looking good.
Pour some more in. Come on.
- How about this? - That's perfect.
- Can I flip it again? - Of course.
Antonio, hi.
How are you feeling?
I'm sorry Harper hit you.
But what you said wasn't very nice.
translation.es: Lo que dijiste no fue muy lindo.

translation.en: I was hoping I could speak to your parents.
Dad's on a business trip. Mum's got a tennis lesson. She's round the back.
translation.es: Papá viajó por negocios. Mamá tiene una clase de tenis. Está atrás.

translation.en: It's her birthday today.
I know. We're coming to her party tonight. It's going to be fun!
translation.es: Lo sé. Vendremos a su fiesta esta noche. ¡Será divertido!

translation.en: - Have you got it fixed yet? - Yeah.
Watch this.
Huh? No. Okay, no, no. No, no.
That is… a work in progress.
Why don't you take the day off?
Oh, I can't. Not with this job review coming up. I need to show my face.
translation.es: No puedo. Están por evaluar mi puesto. Tengo que figurar.

translation.en: Well, can you promise, at least, to not get involved in any armed robberies?
translation.es: ¿Prometes no involucrarte en ningún robo a mano armada?

translation.en: I want to say yes… Ears.
Harper!
Harp, we're going to be late. Move it!
Morning, Emilio.
Wow. Almost made it into your house.
translation.es: Vaya. Casi llegas a tu casa.

translation.en: Almost. Yeah.
I was going to call around last night.
- I heard what happened at the supermarket. - Oh, we're fine. Don't worry about it.
translation.es: - Oí lo que pasó en el supermercado. - Estamos bien. Descuida.

translation.en: We'll need to interview you today or tomorrow.
translation.es: Tendremos que entrevistarte hoy o mañana.

translation.en: I'll be on the investigating team, so don't worry about it.
translation.es: Estaré en el equipo de investigación. No te preocupes.

translation.en: There's not much to say, but okay, sure.
translation.es: No hay mucho que decir, pero sí.

translation.en: - Hey, if you want coffee, Jordi made some. - Okay. Thank you.
translation.es: - Si quieres café, Jordi preparó. - Bueno. Gracias.

translation.en: - See you. - Bye.
Glasses on, Harp.
Why does he sleep in his car?
You know how Emilio's wife doesn't live there anymore?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que su esposa ya no vive ahí?

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, he misses her a lot, so he'd rather sleep in the car than an empty bed.
translation.es: La extraña mucho, prefiere dormir en el auto que en una cama vacía.

translation.en: That's sad.
It is, yeah.
You don't have to be here if you're not ready yet.
translation.es: No tienes que venir si no estás lista.

translation.en: - I can take you home. - I'm fine.
translation.es: - Puedo llevarte a casa. - Estoy bien.

translation.en: Oh, uh, see you later, Mum.
Bye.
You're a hero, Erin.
We are so glad you are okay.
Is Harper okay? We were so worried.
She's fine. Thank you.
So… there's bad news and good news.
Okay.
So the bad news is Penelope Reyna's lodged a formal complaint
translation.es: La mala es que Penelope Reyna presentó una queja formal

translation.en: to have Harper removed from the school.
You're fucking kidding me.
She's very upset about what happened to her son.
translation.es: Está muy molesta por lo que le pasó a su hijo.

translation.en: She claims Harper is a psychopath.
translation.es: Dice que Harper es una psicópata.

translation.en: Olivia, you do know Antonio was making fun of her eye problem.
translation.es: Se burlaba de su problema en la vista.

translation.en: Or was it a sociopath?
Psychopath? Sociopath?
Anyway, people tell me there's a difference, but tomato, tomato.
translation.es: Dicen que no es lo mismo, pero ¿qué saben?

translation.en: I mean, will she succeed or what do I do?
It's Penelope, so…
What's the good news?
The good news. The good news is, well, you got attacked in a supermarket.
translation.es: La buena noticia es que te atacaron en un supermercado.

translation.en: How is that good news, Olivia?
Big picture.
Before you were some faceless drone, a totally forgettable substitute teacher,
translation.es: Antes eras un dron sin rostro, una maestra suplente olvidable,

translation.en: but now you are a hero who stopped a robbery
translation.es: pero ahora eres una heroína que detuvo un robo

translation.en: and definitely deserves that full- time contract.
translation.es: y que se merece un contrato de tiempo completo.

translation.en: Plus, you've got your photo in the paper.
translation.es: y que se merece un contrato de tiempo completo. Y salió tu foto en el periódico.

translation.en: Don't worry. You look great. It's a lovely photo.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Saliste bien. Es una bonita foto.

translation.en: - - Yeah, okay. I need to go.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Saliste bien. Es una bonita foto. Bien. Debo irme.

translation.en: - Okay. - Yeah.
Okay.
- Hello. - Hello.
I'm Mrs. Carter. I'll be filling in for Mr. Luis today.
translation.es: Soy la señorita Carter, hoy reemplazaré al señor Luis.

translation.en: Good aim, Dylan.
It was an accident, Miss.
Don't shoot me.
Okay, so, uh, page 29.
- Hey. - Hello.
- What are you doing here? - I was worried.
How are your classes going?
Okay.
Look, your interview is scheduled for two o'clock tomorrow.
translation.es: Tu entrevista es mañana a las 2:00.

translation.en: Sant Àngel station. You're speaking to Inspector Tabarez.
translation.es: Estación San Ángel. Con el inspector Tabarez.

translation.en: Yeah, okay. But did you need to come all the way here to tell me that?
translation.es: Bien. Pero ¿era necesario que vinieras para decírmelo?

translation.en: No, but I want to give you my take on the situation.
translation.es: No. Quiero darte mi visión de la situación.

translation.en: These people were professionals.
They knew Thursday was the payroll.
translation.es: Sabían que el jueves pagaban sueldos.

translation.en: They came at the end of the day, disabled security cameras except…
translation.es: Llegaron al final del día y apagaron las cámaras, pero…

translation.en: they missed one.
An older model on a different circuit.
translation.es: Un modelo más viejo en otro circuito.

translation.en: - Yeah… - You handled yourself pretty well.
Yeah, well, you hear about these things, don't you?
A woman's child is being trapped under a car,
translation.es: El hijo de una mujer está atrapado bajo un auto,

translation.en: and she finds the strength to
translation.es: y ella encuentra la fuerza para…

translation.en: lift it up.
Or to stab someone in the legs twice with a cake tester
translation.es: ¿O para apuñalar a alguien en las piernas con un pinche?

translation.en: and then shoot them?
I didn't shoot anyone. The gun just went off.
translation.es: No le disparé a nadie. El arma se disparó.

translation.en: - Okay. - Look. Am I in trouble here?
No, no, of course not. I mean…
No, I know you.
But my boss is a bloodhound,
translation.es: Pero mi jefe es un sabueso,

translation.en: and he'll be all over this footage, and maybe to him, this will look a little different,
translation.es: revisará las cintas, y podría ver las cosas de otro modo.

translation.en: so if there's anything you need to tell me, now would be--
translation.es: Así que si tienes algo para decirme, ahora sería…

translation.en: Only that you're being a bit of a dick right now, okay?
translation.es: Solo que estás siendo un imbécil.

translation.en: Okay.
Just be careful. There were two of them at the supermarket.
translation.es: Ten cuidado. Había dos en el supermercado.

translation.en: One's dead but the other one… the other one is still out there.
translation.es: Uno está muerto, pero el otro sigue suelto.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
Thanks, Emilio.
I feel great now.
- I'll see you at the party. - Yeah, okay. See you later.
translation.es: - Te veré en la fiesta. - Nos vemos.

translation.en: But look after yourself.
I am.
Hey, Harp. Harp.
Go and find Antonio and say hello to him.
Do I have to?
Well, yeah.
Go. Go.
Yeah.
- Everybody's talking about you. - Yeah.
Penelope's going to love that, someone else being the center of attention.
translation.es: A Penelope le encantará que otro sea el centro de atención.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe I should, I don't know, wish her a happy birthday.
translation.es: Sí, quizá debería, no sé, saludarla por su cumpleaños.

translation.en: That's a good idea.
- Yeah. - And we will go find the bar.
Yeah, that's an even better idea.
translation.es: Sí, es una idea aún mejor.

translation.en: You okay?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'm good.
Hey, Antonio.
My mum says I've got to apologize to you.
translation.es: Mi mamá dice que debo disculparme.

translation.en: So shake my hand.
If you don't shake my hand, I'm going to stab your eyes out.
translation.es: Si no me das la mano, te arrancaré los ojos.

translation.en: Mmm, thank you, Antonio. You look very smart.
I'm gonna go get some ice cream now.
Penelope.
Hi.
Harper's very sorry about what happened and I'm sorry too.
translation.es: Harper lamenta mucho lo que pasó, y yo también.

translation.en: Thank you, Erin. That means a lot.
Yeah, she's been…
She's had a tough week. Okay, she's… It's been a lot.
translation.es: Tuvo una semana difícil. Ha sido muy duro.

translation.en: I know, and it breaks my heart.
translation.es: Lo sé, y me rompe el corazón.

translation.en: But the other children need to be protected from her.
translation.es: Pero hay que proteger de ella a los niños.

translation.en: Oh, fuck off, Penelope.
Seriously? She's… she's not a danger to anyone.
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¡No es una amenaza para nadie!

translation.en: She doesn't have to be kicked out of school. I can see where she gets her temper from.
translation.es: - No hay que expulsarla. - Veo de dónde saca su temperamento.

translation.en: Okay, I apologize.
But I was hoping we could sort this ourselves, as neighbors.
translation.es: Pero esperaba poder resolver esto entre vecinas.

translation.en: We're not neighbors.
We just live near each other.
You think you're better than everyone else?
Me?
You have a giant, naked ice sculpture of yourself. Come on.
translation.es: Tú tienes una escultura de hielo de ti desnuda.

translation.en: That was a gift of love from my husband.
translation.es: Fue un regalo de mi esposo.

translation.en: I will try my best to be a better neighbor,
translation.es: Me esforzaré por ser mejor vecina,

translation.en: if that's what you want, but please don't…
translation.es: si eso quieres, pero, por favor, no…

translation.en: don't get Harper expelled. She needs this.
translation.es: Que no la expulsen, necesita esto.

translation.en: We'll see, Erin.
Now move along. You're spoiling the view.
translation.es: Ahora circula. Estás arruinando la vista.

translation.en: Wow.
Are you all right?
- Yeah. - Yeah?
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
Uh- huh. Yeah.
Yeah, come on.
We weren't arguing. I was just asking her the name of her ice sculptor.
translation.es: No discutimos. Le pregunté quién hizo la estatua de hielo.

translation.en: You never know when you're going to need one.
It was quite impressive, I have to admit.
Do you think she has a special guy for that?
Well, she didn't want to tell me.
What?
I turned the lights off before we left.
translation.es: Apagué las luces antes de salir.

translation.en: Harp, wait here.
Or maybe you just forgot?
Good afternoon, Mrs. Carter. I'm Inspector Tabarez. Let's get started.
translation.es: Buenas tardes, señora Carter. Soy el inspector Tabarez. Empecemos.

translation.en: In Strasbourg, you were a private tutor to an American family.
translation.es: En Estrasburgo, fue maestra particular de una familia estadounidense.

translation.en: Yes, the Palmers. They had two children, Lisa and Mark.
translation.es: Sí, los Palmer. Tenían dos hijos, Lisa y Mark.

translation.en: And when you started as a substitute at St. Joseph's International,
translation.es: Y cuando entró como suplente en la escuela St. Joseph International,

translation.en: this Palmer family were provided as reference.
translation.es: puso a la familia Palmer como referencia.

translation.en: Yes, I think so. Yes.
The phone number that you gave for them is no longer in use.
translation.es: El número de teléfono que puso de ellos ya no funciona.

translation.en: People change phones.
No, there is no trace of any such family in Strasbourg at that time.
translation.es: No. No hay rastros de esa familia en Estrasburgo en ese momento.

translation.en: I… I don't know what to tell you. They were there and…
translation.es: No sé qué decirle. Estaban ahí…

translation.en: Your husband, Jordi Collantes, is a nurse at Hospital General?
translation.es: Su esposo, Jordi Collantes, es enfermero del Hospital General.

translation.en: He took you to the ICU to see the injured man from the supermarket?
translation.es: ¿La llevó a la UCI a ver al herido del supermercado?

translation.en: Yes, I felt bad about what happened.
translation.es: Sí, me sentí mal por lo que pasó.

translation.en: You felt bad about the person who tried to kill you?
translation.es: ¿Se sintió mal por el hombre que quiso matarla?

translation.en: I felt bad about what happened. Yes.
translation.es: Me sentí mal por lo que pasó. Sí.

translation.en: And was your husband with you when this man suffered his heart attack?
translation.es: ¿Estaba con su esposo cuando el hombre sufrió el infarto?

translation.en: No, I asked him to go check on our daughter, Harper.
translation.es: No, le pedí que fuera a ver a nuestra hija.

translation.en: Oh, so you were alone with the deceased?
Well, Jordi was only gone for a minute
and there was a policeman outside the room the whole time.
translation.es: y había un policía en la puerta todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Did you know that asphyxiation can bring on a cardiac arrest?
translation.es: ¿Sabía que la asfixia puede provocar un paro cardíaco?

translation.en: No, I did not.
So maybe this man died due to complications from his gunshot wound,
translation.es: Quizá este hombre murió por complicaciones en su herida de bala,

translation.en: or maybe someone took a pillow and with their hands…
translation.es: o quizá alguien tomó una almohada y con las manos…

translation.en: Hold on. I've done nothing wrong.
translation.es: Espere, yo no hice nada malo.

translation.en: That is not for you to decide.
Listen. I don't give a fuck what you think the CCTV footage shows you, okay?
translation.es: Mire, me importa un carajo lo que crea que vio en el video, ¿sí?

translation.en: Does it show my daughter, terrified?
translation.es: ¿No vio que mi hija estaba aterrada?

translation.en: Hiding from the man with the fucking gun?
translation.es: ¿Escondida del hombre con la puta pistola?

translation.en: No.
There is no footage from the supermarket.
All the cameras had been turned off.
I'm sorry. That must make your job a lot harder.
translation.es: Lo siento. Eso debe complicar mucho su trabajo.

translation.en: And also, sorry for all the swearing.
Harper, let's go.
How did it go?
Apparently there was no supermarket footage.
translation.es: Al parecer, no había video del supermercado.

translation.en: Weird.
Maybe there was a problem with that other camera after all.
translation.es: Tal vez pasó algo con la otra cámara.

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
Erin.
Erin, stop, please.
I thought I was helping you.
And what if someone finds out, huh?
Do you know what that makes me look like? Like I've got something to hide.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué creerán? Que tengo algo que ocultar.

translation.en: I thought it'd be easier this way.
translation.es: Pensé que así sería más fácil.

translation.en: Well, it isn't. Is it?
Emilio, I didn't ask for your help. I didn't ask you to steal camera footage.
translation.es: Emilio, no te pedí ayuda. No te pedí que robaras las imágenes.

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this.
Mum, what is it?
Sorry, I'm okay. It's just…
translation.es: Lo siento, estoy bien, es solo…

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder if we made a mistake in coming here.
translation.es: a veces me pregunto si fue un error venir aquí.

translation.en: Harper.
Harp, slow down.
- You left your glasses in the car. - I don't care.
translation.es: - Dejaste tus gafas en el auto. - No me importa.

translation.en: The sun is bad for your eyes.
translation.es: El sol te hace mal a los ojos.

translation.en: Good. I want to go blind. I'm bored of waiting.
translation.es: Bien. Quiero quedar ciega. Me aburrí de esperar.

translation.en: Put your glasses on.
- Harp! - You're hurting me!
I'm not hurting you. I'm trying to protect you.
Leave me alone!
I don't want to go. I like it here.
translation.es: No quiero irme. Me gusta aquí.

translation.en: Hey.
Do you remember when we first moved here?
And I couldn't keep you out of the water.
You wanted to go to the beach every day.
translation.es: Pedías ir a la playa todos los días.

translation.en: You'd wake us up at 6:00 a.m. with your costume on.
translation.es: Nos despertabas a las 6:00 a. m. con la malla puesta.

translation.en: And I had to stop because the sun hurts my eyes.
translation.es: Dejé de hacerlo porque el sol me daña la vista.

translation.en: Well, that's why you need to wear your special glasses.
translation.es: Por eso debes usar tus gafas especiales.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on, Harp!
Hey, Mum…
Harp, you can go inside the house. I'm just…
I'm just going to have a quick chat with Penelope.
She hates me, doesn't she?
What? No.
Of course not. No, she doesn't.
translation.es: Claro que no. No te odia.

translation.en: I was just starting to enjoy school.
Please don't let her kick me out.
Please, Mum.
Listen, she's not going to, okay?
Don't worry.
Come here.
Now go inside.
I'll see you there.
Hey.
Have you dropped your complaint against Harper yet?
No. Of course not.
I'm going to ask you politely one last time.
translation.es: Te pediré amablemente una última vez.

translation.en: Please.
No means no, Erin.
I filmed you
having sex with your tennis coach.
translation.es: Teniendo sexo con tu profesor de tenis.

translation.en: Have you lost your mind?
Spying on people.
- Filming them. - You came after my family.
translation.es: - La filmas. - Te metiste con mi familia.

translation.en: Your daughter broke my son's teeth.  I'm not saying this is my finest hour, okay?
translation.es: - Le rompió los dientes a mi hijo. - No me da orgullo.

translation.en: But if you don't back down,
I have no choice. I'll send the video to your husband.
translation.es: le enviaré el video a tu esposo.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You see, Erin,
he phoned the morning of my birthday,
translation.es: Me llamó la mañana de mi cumpleaños,

translation.en: said he wasn't able to make it home.
translation.es: dijo que no llegaría a tiempo.

translation.en: Some important meeting.
When I told him I was upset, he said,
translation.es: Cuando le dije que estaba molesta,

translation.en: he'd paid for the fucking party, what more did I want?
translation.es: dijo que había pagado la fiesta, ¿qué más quería?

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that, um…
And I'm not judging you. I'm just…
translation.es: Y no te estoy juzgando, solo…

translation.en: I'm protecting my daughter.
I see no reason why we can't sort this out between us.
As neighbors.
Thank you, Penelope.
Don't thank me.
What you've done here, Erin, it was a mistake.
translation.es: Lo que hiciste, Erin, fue un error.

translation.en: A big mistake.
Dinner is served. How hungry are you?
translation.es: La cena está servida. ¿Cuánta hambre tienes?

translation.en: Kind of hungry.
Okay, I will give you a kind- of- hungry portion. Hey.
translation.es: Bien. Te daré una porción para bastante hambre.

translation.en: Here we go. We need to eat fast if we're going to make it to Harper's musical on time.
translation.es: Aquí tienes. Debemos comer rápido para llegar al musical de Harper.

translation.en: Harper is, uh… she's, um…
she's not in the musical.
What?
What happened?
They just had too many people or something.
translation.es: Ya había demasiados o algo así.

translation.en: It's one of those things.
I broke two of Antonio's teeth. Now Mrs. Reyna's trying to expel me.
translation.es: Le rompí dos dientes a Antonio, y la señora Reyna quiere expulsarme.

translation.en: Wait. What? Seriously?
Okay, relax. Okay?
Relax?
I'm sorry. I should've said something. Yeah.
Can we talk about this later? I really need to get changed.
translation.es: ¿Podemos hablar de esto después? Tengo que ir a cambiarme.

translation.en: Harp, you can eat in front of the TV.
translation.es: Harp, puedes comer frente a la TV.

translation.en: Um, so, you know, Penelope trying to get our daughter kicked out of school,
translation.es: Que Penelope quiera que echen a nuestra hija de la escuela

translation.en: it's kind of a big deal.
I've sorted it out.
How?
It doesn't matter.
All of it matters.
The supermarket, the police, everything.
You could have died the other night.
translation.es: Podrías haber muerto la otra noche.

translation.en: But you're acting like it was normal.
translation.es: Pero actúas como si fuera normal.

translation.en: Look at me.
I'm wearing a tie.
I fucking hate ties.
I think it looks nice.
When did you start keeping things from me and shutting me out?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo empezaste a ocultarme cosas y a dejarme afuera?

translation.en: Enjoy the show. It's just through this way.
Enjoy the show.
- Right. - Welcome.
It's through this way.
Hi!
Enjoy the show.
- Nice to see you. - You too.
- Welcome. - Thank you.
Hello.
Enjoy the show. Thank you very much.
So, what's tonight's excuse?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la excusa de esta noche?

translation.en: Traffic? Flood?
I had a fight with Jordi.
I just…
I just don't know how you do it.
You have twice as many kids and responsibilities,
translation.es: Tienes el doble de hijos y responsabilidades,

translation.en: but you're always on time, always on form.
translation.es: pero siempre llegas en tiempo y forma.

translation.en: I'm so high right now, this is basically an out- of- body experience.
translation.es: Estoy tan drogada que esto es una experiencia extracorpórea.

translation.en: - Whoa. - I know.
You'll be okay.
You're right where you're meant to be.
- Yeah. You're high. -
Yeah.
Fuck's sake, we're missing it. Come on. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
translation.es: Mierda, nos lo vamos a perder. Vamos. Ve.

translation.en: ♪ All that surrounds you ♪
♪ Every light in the sky ♪
♪ The stars hanging over your head ♪
♪ The sun burning brightly in red ♪
translation.es: El sol que brilla rojo y ardiente.

translation.en: ♪ It all started with a bang ♪
♪ It started with a bang ♪
- ♪ It started with a bang… ♪ - Hey, I'll be back in one minute.
translation.es: Comenzó con una explosión. Oye, ya vuelvo.

translation.en: ♪ All that surrounds you ♪
♪ Every light in the sky… ♪
Excuse me.
Can I help you?
If you're looking for the restroom, they're back towards the entrance hall.
translation.es: Si buscas el baño, está cerca de la entrada.

translation.en: I think you should leave before I call security.
translation.es: Deberías irte antes de que llame a seguridad.

translation.en: You know, I almost didn't believe it.
When I saw you in the supermarket, I thought,
translation.es: Cuando te vi en el supermercado, pensé: Debe ser

translation.en: Ah, it must be like a… trick of the light. Must be a mistake.
translation.es: Cuando te vi en el supermercado, pensé: Debe ser un espejismo. Debe ser un error.

translation.en: But no.
It really is you.
I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
Jesus Christ, what the--
- Look at me. -
Fucking look at me, Kate!
There she is!
You shouldn't have come here.
Yeah, I wasn't planning on staying, Kate.
- But I know you have it. - No, I don't.
translation.es: - Pero sé que lo tienes. - No es así.

translation.en: Look at what I've been reduced to.
translation.es: Mira a lo que me han reducido.

translation.en: I'm holding up fucking supermarkets. That's one step above purse snatching!
translation.es: ¡Estoy robando putos supermercados, es casi como robar carteras!

translation.en: And it's all because of what you did.
translation.es: Y todo por culpa de lo que hiciste.

translation.en: Just give it to me. Then I'm gone. No one else needs to know you're here.
translation.es: Solo dámelo. Luego me iré, y nadie más sabrá que estás aquí.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. I want to believe that.
But it's you, so I don't.
translation.es: Pero eres tú. Así que no lo creo.

translation.en: Okay.
I never liked you anyway.
I'm not going to hurt the kid, but I'll have to take her with me.
translation.es: No lastimaré a la niña, pero tendré que llevármela.

translation.en: Otherwise, they won't believe me. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Si no, no me creerán. Lo siento.

translation.en: - - Stay away from her!
What the fuck?
Is she dead?
Jesus Christ.
Who is she?
She's the woman from the supermarket.
You warned me, didn't you?
Okay.
Okay.
Clean up what you can.
We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy up and get the fucking body out of here.
translation.es: Tenemos 15 minutos para limpiar y sacar el cuerpo de aquí.

translation.en: ♪ We share the same solar system… ♪
- It's faster if you help. - Okay.
translation.es: - Es más rápido si ayudas. - Bien.

translation.en: ♪ We all share the same intergalactic ♪
That should be deep enough.
Come.
- Do you want to say a few words? - What?
Fuck you for this.
Fuck you.
I meant a prayer or something.
translation.es: Me refería a rezar o algo así.

translation.en: But no, that's good.
I mean… That's good.
Why are you helping me?
'Cause you are the wife of my best friend.
translation.es: Porque eres la esposa de mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: We are practically family.
And also, I'm in trouble.
I've got mixed up with some bad people.
So maybe I help you and then you help me.
translation.es: Quizá, si yo te ayudo, tú me ayudas.

translation.en: Emilio, I'm a schoolteacher.
Yes, of course you are.
Mrs. Carter in the classroom with a dead body.
translation.es: La señorita Carter está en el aula con un cadáver.

translation.en: What if I don't want to help you?
I'm getting a bad feeling about this.
And when I get a bad feeling, I just…
translation.es: Y cuando tengo un mal presentimiento,

translation.en: I walk away.
I think it might be burnt.
Okay, let me see that.
Sorry.
How about I cook and you flip, yeah?
translation.es: ¿Si yo cocino y tú los volteas?

translation.en: Sounds good.
There… that one.
- That's it. -
Mum.
